internes (scoring, extracteurs, syst√®mes d'alerte, etc.).Assurer l'√©volution des outils du p√¥le en √©troite collaboration avec l'√©quipe SEA.Maintenir des syst√®mes de scraping fiables et performants (produits, marketplaces, SERP).Int√©grer de nouveaux frameworks et APIs, et challenger les outils du march√© pour garantir notre avance technologique.Innovation et Int√©gration de l'IA internes.

Une restitution vous sera propos√©e. Nous nous engageons √† rendre ce process aussi rapide et efficace que possible, et √† maintenir une communication ouverte et transparente tout au long du process.

WPP Media garantit l'√©galit√© des chances et consid√®re tous les candidats sans discrimination ni consid√©ration de caract√©ristiques particuli√®res. jobs.title: Content Writers / Generalists ( Part-Time ) $45 ‚Äì $50/hr Remote US
jobs.description: Creative Writers and GeneralistsRemote | Hourly Contract | $45‚Äì$50 per hourRole OverviewCreative Writers and Evaluation Tutors are needed to support research projects in collaboration with a leading AI lab. The role involves contributing to data campaigns across Creative Writing, Companionship, and Presentation domains. Successful candidates will apply judgment, critical thinking, and domain expertise to evaluate which responses are most effective, natural, and compelling.Ideal ProfilesCreative WritingBackground in fiction, poetry, screenwriting, or narrative development.Experience producing original content such as speeches, dialogues, or literary critiques.Ability to assess creativity, originality, and narrative flow.CompanionshipAbility to recognize responses that demonstrate empathy, emotional intelligence, and helpfulness.Awareness of tone, conciseness, and natural conversational flow.Understanding of what makes interactions feel authentic and supportive.PresentationAbility to evaluate responses for clarity, structure, and polish.Strong understanding of how to articulate and communicate ideas effectively.Familiarity with persuasive, professional, or educational communication styles is a plus.General RequirementsBroad knowledge base and ability to apply skills across multiple areas.High proficiency in English (written and spoken).Strong communication skills and reliability in a remote, independent work environment.Attention to detail with consistent, objective judgment.Ability to manage deadlines effectively.Role DetailsHours: 20‚Äì40 per week (flexible and ongoing).Location: Fully remote, asynchronous ‚Äî manage your own schedule.Compensation: $45‚Äì$50 per hour.
